data.name: Air Combat
data.detailed_description:
This game was updated in February 2019 to version 2.00!

The player's aircraft has been changed to the XF-97 prototype.
Four levels have been added.
The mobility of the player's aircraft has been upgraded.
The following aircrafts were added.
MQ - 9 (drone), F - 16, F - 15, Su - 27, AC - 130 (transport), and F - 15 Ace.
The previous game is now version 1.00, but you can play it. Right click the game name from the STEAM application and press Properties, Beta. You can now play 7 levels in all.

Story
Level 1: Maxell The federal UAVs are violating our airspace. Board the XF-97 prototype and make a sortie.
Level 2: Enemy aircrafts are gathering at our border. You can cope with this problem.
Level 3: They are transporting supplies for war by AC-130. They will give up war if the supplies are gone.
Extra stage: The enemy's ace pilot does not seem to give up war yet. Shoot down them all.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1012160/SkyGameChangerAirCombat_II

About version 1.00
It is the first work of the flight shooting game "Air combat series".

It is suitable for such a player.
· I would like to enjoy flight shooting game with cheap price easily.
· I am seeking simple operation method and easy difficulty level.

It is not suitable for such players.
· I want to play a full flight simulation game.
· I want to enjoy a deep story.
· I do not like the low quality of graphics.

Become a fighter pilot and achieve three missions.
There are two features of this game.

1 Adjusted player's aircraft
Pitches, rolls, yawing etc. The aircraft is nearer to the real airplane without extreme movement.
But the maneuvering method is simple, you can intuitively navigate.
You can switch between camera view, flight view, cockpit view, side view, and rear view.

2 Ally aircraft
Ally aircrafts appear in every mission.
You can not lock the missile for the friendly aircraft, but you must pay attention to the misfire caused by the cannon.
When the friendly aircraft is shot down, the difficulty level of the mission will rise.

Method of operation

C: Switch the camera. The main use is cockpit view.
Mouse: Raise, lower and turn your own machine.
W: Speed ​​up.
S: Speed ​​down.
A: Shift your aircraft to the left. (Yaw)
D: Shift your aircraft to the right. (Yaw)
Right-click: Switch your weapons. Missiles and machine guns.
Left click: Firing weapons.
ESC: Pose screen.

data.short_description: Huge update! Board the XF - 97 prototype and enjoy the air battle! You will remember a nostalgic arcade game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 or Shader Model 3 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX11 Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octo-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX11 Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
